entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.2°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early this morning. Rain beginning this afternoon. Wind light except north 30 km/h over southern sections this morning. High 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 60%
